channel.title: Abouts on SeaYuns Space
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on SeaYuns Space

item.title: 关于博主
item.description: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Katibeh&display=swap'); .about-info { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: flex-start; } .about-info-left li { list-style-type: none; } .about-info-right { margin: .5em 1.25em; } .about-info-right img { width: 130px; } .about-info-right .left-ear, .about-info-right .left-hand, .about-info-right .right-ear, .about-info-right .right-hand { display: none; } @media only screen and (min-device-width: 320px) and (max-device-width: 480px) { .about-info { flex-direction: column-reverse; align-items: center; } .about-info-right { margin: auto auto 2em; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .
